text: is a Japanese actor and musician. He is a member of the J-pop duo Tackey & Tsubasa from Tokyo. In 2012 he reached the age of 20 and completed his graduation from Johnny's Junior. In the same year he debuted with Tsubasa Imai in the group Tackey & Tsubasa under the record label Avex Trax. == Dramas == * Ai Love Jr. variety show * Mokuyou no Kaidan Kaiki Curabu ~ Shogakusei Hen ~ (1995) * Mokuyou no Kaidan Kaiki Curabu ~ Chuugakusei Hen ~ (1995) * The Chef (1995) * Shin Mokuyou no Kaidan ~ Gakko no Nanafushigi Hen ~ (1996) * Dareka ga Dareka ni Koishiteru [Drama SP] (1996) * Mokuyou no Kaidan: Time keepers (1997) * News no Onna (1998) * Kokoro No Tobira (1998) * Majou no Jōken (1999) * Genroku Ryoran (1999) * Taiyou wa Shizumanai (2000) * Antique (based on manga, Antique Bakery) (2001) * Strawberry on the Shortcake (2001) * Taiyō no Kisetsu (2002)|Taiyō no Kisetsu (2002) * Boku Dake no Madonna (2003) * My Father's Ocean, My Sky (Chichi no Umi, Boku no Sora) (2004) * Yoshitsune (2005–2006) * Satomi Hakkenden" (2006) * Kimi ga Kureta Natsu (2007) * Romeo and Juliet (2007) * Yukinojo Henge (2008) * Kokuchisezu (2008) * Orthros no Inu (2010)'' * Akutou (2012) * Mayonaka no Panya San (2013) == Songs written by Takki == * Words of Love * Everlasting Love * 894…Hakushi * Madonna (for DreamBoy musical in 2004) * Futari no Yoru * My Angel, You are Angel (for KAT- TUN; released in Cartoon KAT-TUN II You album 2007) * Fight All Night (for KAT-TUN; for DreamBoy musical in 2004; released in Cartoon KAT-TUN II You album 2007) * Da.ke.do * Jūnigatsu no Hana * With Love * Ai.Kakumei * Mugen no Hane ==References== ==Other websites== * Tackey & Tsubasa official webite Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Tokyo Category:Musicians from Tokyo
